attributes.action: Sign this petition if you believe there should be another general election!
attributes.additional_details:
A new general election has to take place so we can have the right government (Prime Minister) dealing with the European Union!
We cannot have a Prime Minster or Goverment who wants and still believes we are better off in the European Union, we need to move on now, and deal with our future. Which is outside the European Union!
attributes.background: If you believe a new general election should be called so we can have the right Government (Prine Minister) in power of dealing with the European Union, then sign this petition!
